name: Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii: Summer Sun (ROM Hack)
name_original: Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii: Summer Sun (ROM Hack)
description: Newer: Summer Sun (also called Newer Super Mario Bros.: Summer Sun or Newer Super Mario Bros. Wii: Summer Sun by fans) is a short seasonal ROM hack of New Super Mario Bros. Wii by the Newer Team. It was released in summer 2012, making it the second Newer hack to be released.
